Comment: As head of the cost-cutting initiative DOGE, Elon Musk is determined to find tens of billions of dollars in savings for the Defense Department and lay off hundreds of thousands of defense employees.  However, while Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has publicly supported DOGE’s efforts, behind the scenes, he has reportedly opposed Musk’s attempts to cut civilian personnel working in military hospitals, shipyards, munitions factories, and schools.  [**Read the full story**](https://www.thedailybeast.com/pete-hegseths-secret-battle-against-elon-musk-is-fueling-pentagon-mayhem/).
